enWisdom: A bad character is one of the two torments

Wisdom: سُوءُ الْخُلُقِ نَكَدُ الْعَيْشِ وَعَذَابُ النَّفْسِ
enWisdom: Bad character makes life bitter and is a torment for the soul

Wisdom: سُوءُ الْخُلُقِ يُوحِشُ النَّفْسَ وَيَرْفَعُ الْأُنْسَ
enWisdom: Bad character alienates the soul and removes amiability
One who makes his character bad, torments his [own] soul
One whose character is bad torments his [own] soul
One whose space is restricted, his comfort is less
There is no life for the one who has a bad character
